TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示调用方上下文的抽象，该上下文提供对 、 和 对象的访问。

span.span: Represents an abstraction of the caller's context, which provides access to the , , and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以用于获取触发器上下文 （适用于在触发器中执行的代码） 和管道对象 （如果可用，如存储过程中）。The object can be used to obtain the trigger context (for code executing in a trigger) and the pipe object (when available, such as in stored procedures). 此外可以用于获取对象，表示调用客户端的 Microsoft Windows 标识，如果客户端进行身份验证服务器使用集成身份验证。It can also be used to obtain a object that represents the Microsoft Windows identity of the calling client, if the client authenticated with the server using integrated authentication. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新并将其。The following example creates a new and its . 该示例然后表示结果集使用开头方法中，将使用示例数据记录发送回客户端使用方法，并使用集结果的结尾标记方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsAvailable As Boolean
public: static property bool IsAvailable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指定调用代码是否在 SQL Server 中运行，以及上下文连接是否可访问。

span.span: Specifies whether the calling code is running within SQL Server, and if the context connection can be accessed.

value.span: 如果上下文连接可用，并且其他 成员可访问，则为 。

span.span: if the context connection is available and the other members can be accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性返回 false，所有其他成员引发如果使用。If this property returns false, all the other members throw an if used. 如果此属性返回 false，任何尝试打开的连接对象的具有"上下文连接 = true"的连接字符串中将失败。If this property returns false, any attempt to open a connection object that has "context connection=true" in the connection string fails. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only. 在使用 ADO.NET 的数据访问，如果一段代码可能会运行 （使用公共语言运行时集成） 的 SQL Server 内部和外部 SQL Server，此属性可用于检查上下文连接是否可用。When using ADO.NET for data-access, if a piece of code may run both inside SQL Server (using common language runtime integration) and outside SQL Server, this property can be used to check whether the context connection is available.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pipe As SqlPipe
public: static property Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::SqlPipe ^ Pipe { Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::SqlPipe ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取允许调用方将结果集、消息和命令的执行结果发送回客户端的管道对象。

span.span: Gets the pipe object that allows the caller to send result sets, messages, and the results of executing commands back to the client.

value.span: 如果管道可用，则为 的实例；如果在管道不可用的上下文中（如在用户定义的函数中）调用，则为 。

span.span: An instance of if a pipe is available, or if called in a context where pipe is not available (for example, in a user-defined function).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果从 SQL Server 外，调用引发。If invoked from outside SQL Server, a is thrown. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TriggerContext As SqlTriggerContext

summary.span: 获取触发器上下文，该上下文用于向调用方提供有关导致触发器激发的原因的信息，以及被更新的列的映射。

span.span: Gets the trigger context used to provide the caller with information about what caused the trigger to fire, and a map of the columns that were updated.

value.span: 如果触发器上下文可用，则为 的实例；如果在触发器调用之外调用，则为 。

span.span: An instance of if a trigger context is available, or if called outside of a trigger invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象只能从公共语言运行时触发器中检索。The object can only be retrieved from within a common language runtime trigger. 如果从 SQL Server 外部访问属性引发。If the property is accessed from outside of SQL Server, a is thrown. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WindowsIdentity As WindowsIdentity

summary.span: 调用方的 Microsoft Windows 标识。

span.span: The Microsoft Windows identity of the caller.

value.span: 表示调用方的 Windows 标识的 实例；如果客户端是使用“SQL Server 身份验证”进行身份验证的，则为 。

span.span: A instance representing the Windows identity of the caller, or if the client was authenticated using SQL Server Authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 SQL Server 内的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 代码始终在进程帐户的上下文中调用。Common language runtime (CLR) code inside SQL Server is always invoked in the context of the process account. 如果有必要，代码将执行操作而不 SQL Server 进程标识使用调用用户的标识，应通过此属性获取模拟标记。If it is necessary for the code to perform an action using calling user’s identity instead of the SQL Server process identity, then an impersonation token should be obtained through this property. 在获取了 对象之后，调用方可以模拟客户端帐户并代表它们执行操作。After obtaining the object, callers can impersonate the client account and perform actions on their behalf. 如果从 SQL Server 外，调用引发。If invoked from outside SQL Server, a is thrown. 只有使用 `EXTERNAL_ACCESS` 或 `UNSAFE` 权限标记的程序集可以访问此属性。Only assemblies marked with `EXTERNAL_ACCESS` or `UNSAFE` permissions can access this property. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取调用客户端的 Windows 标识并模拟客户端。The following example shows how to get the Windows identity of the calling client and impersonate the client. 请参阅 SQL Server 联机丛书中的模拟使用示例的"模拟示例"属性。See "Impersonation Sample" in SQL Server Books Online for an example of impersonation using the property. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]
